string-array.name: eventMessages
string-array.item: Nothing has happened. We thought we should let you know.
Something is causing the wild vegetation to grow at a faster rate. There will be more plant life for the Birbs to eat for a few generations
Small animals appear to be more plentiful. The Carnivorous Birbs will have more food for a few generations.
A heat wave is making its way through this area. The temperature will be higher for a few generations.
A cold snap has struck this area. The temperature will be lower for a few generations.
A pack of roving predators have arrived area. They appear hungry.
A Monsoon has arrived! There will be flooding. Better hope the birbs can swim!
A catastrophe as struck! After a violent explosion, radioactive fallout will cause the birbs to mutate at a faster rate (for better or for worse).
The Birb Flu has begun affecting the population of birbs. Nothing they can do except ride it out for a few generations.
Something in the air is causing the birbs to reproduce more, these few generations will be known as the "Birby Boomers"
A cargo ship has crashed in this location! Should the birbs investigate the ship or leave it alone?
Something is now killing the vegetation in the area. The birbs will have a hard time obtaining non-meat food.
Something has killed many of the small animals the carnivorous birbs like to hunt. They will have a hard time finding food.
Two birbs gave birth to twins! Two birbs were born instead of one for this pair!
